import React from 'react'; import { AudioMutedOutlined, ArrowLeftOutlined, StepBackwardOutlined, StepForwardOutlined, PlayCircleFilled } from '@ant-design/icons'; import "./content.css" let audio = new Audio("./NewRomantics.flac") audio.addEventListener("timeupdate", function(){ document.getElementById("totalTime").innerHTML = audio.duration; document.getElementById("currentTime").innerHTML = audio.currentTime; }, true) class Content extends React.Component { render() { return(

New Romantics

) } } export default Content;
